mapper.select: select COUNT(*) as articleCnt, SUM(view_count) as viewCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM message_board) as commentCnt FROM article

select id, type_id as type, title, article_content as content, introduce, FROM_UNIXTIME(addTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) as addTime, view_count as viewCnt, tags from article order by addTime desc limit #{pageId}, 3

select a.id, type_id as type, t.typeName as typeName, title, article_content as content, introduce, FROM_UNIXTIME(addTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) as addTime, view_count as viewCnt, tags from article a left join type t ON a.type_id = t.id where type_id = #{typeId}
mapper.update: update article set view_count = view_count + 1 where id = #{articleId}
mapper.select: select a.id, type_id as type, t.typeName as typeName, title, article_content as content, introduce, FROM_UNIXTIME(addTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) as addTime, view_count as viewCnt, tags from article a left join type t ON a.type_id = t.id where a.id = #{articleId}
select id, message, nickname, addTime, article_id as articleId, if_display as isValid, email from message_board where article_id = #{articleId} and if_display = '1'
